bibl.title: A Toronto Ostracon with a List of Monosyllables (2718 Pack2): Re-Edition with Commentary.
bibl.note: Ostracon published by J.G. Milne in 1908, recently recovered in the collection of the Royal Ontario Museum: O. Ont. Mus. Inv. 906.8.787.1-2 = (Pack2 2718). - Physical description. - Transcript. - Palaeographical notes. - Commentary. - Comparison with other lists of monosyllables.
HUYS Marc and Thomas SCHMIDT, A Toronto Ostracon with a List of Monosyllables (2718 Pack2): Re-Edition with Commentary.
